Meet Our Team

Leadership

Bastiaan Janmaat, CEO

Bastiaan sets the strategic vision of DataFox, as he has done since its founding in 2013. Prior to DataFox, he honed his prospecting skills identifying growing tech companies at Goldman Sachs. He is a graduate of the Universiteit van Tilburg in the Netherlands and the Stanford Graduate School of Business.

Mike Dorsey, COO

Mike manages DataFox’s operations, with a focus on product, data, and customer success. He received advanced degrees in international economics and finance before earning a joint engineering MS-MBA from Stanford University. He previously co-founded a profitable SaaS company offering demand generation and CRM.

Ben Trombley, CTO

Ben manages DataFox’s engineering team and oversees the technical side of the company. He came to DataFox from Box, where designed and built core frameworks, led a team of senior engineers, and helped the organization scale from 60 to 1,000 employees. He received a BS in computer science from Stanford University.

Alden Timme, Chief Data Scientist

Alden is responsible for DataFox’s natural language processing, keyword similarity and scoring. He holds a BS and MS in computer science from Stanford University, where he specialized in NLP, and was pursuing a PhD in statistics there before leaving to found DataFox and give his research a real-world application.

Advisors

Erik Nierenberg

Erik is an advisor to several high-growth startups and nonprofits. Most recently Erik was SVP and GM of Enterprise at Lynda.com, which was acquired by LinkedIn. Before Lynda.com Erik spent seven years in executive roles at Salesforce across sales, marketing, business development and product management. He started his career as a Bain consultant and venture investor at Enterprise Partners.

Steve Alesio

Steve is currently an operating partner at Providence Equity. Prior to that, he headed Dun & Bradstreet Corporation, serving in various senior leadership positions, including senior vice president, president and COO, and was elected to the board of directors. He spent 19 years with American Express, where he served in marketing and general management roles.

Ram Shriram

Ram is a founding board member at Google and {24}7 and is on the boards of Zazzle and Paperless Post. He was an executive at Netscape, Amazon and Junglee and is the founder of Sherpalo, a venture capital firm that invests in promising disruptive technologies with a portfolio including DocuSign and Optimizely.

Martina Cheung

Martina is an executive managing director at S&P Capital IQ, where she is responsible for monetizing and leveraging McGraw Hill Financial’s intellectual property. She previously worked as the chief strategy officer at McGraw Hill Financial and as a managing director at Standard & Poor’s.

324 5th Street
San Francisco, CA 94107
(415) 969-2144
info@datafox.com

Request Free Trial

Fill out the form below and we'll be in touch shortly
Call our sales team

+1 (415) 969-2144

"Our outbound reps used to spend over half their day on research and data input. With DataFox, our reps spend more time actually calling on prospects, with personalized messages that open doors to valuable conversations.In addition, our customer success managers know which clients to contact with the right message at the right time. Our productivity has gone way up!"

Casey Clegg, Sr. Director, Strategic Account Management

"With all the new prospects that DataFox has uncovered, Rainforest QA was able to scale our outbound sales development team from 2 to 5 members."

Jake Biskar, Head of Sales Development

"In my scouting work for strategic investment opportunities, I sometimes meet with up to 3 or 4 companies a day. DataFox helps me find new startups in areas of strategic interest and provides analytics to help prioritize my engagements."

Steve Proffitt, Sr. Manager Corporate Development
